name: Dodge (itch) (Gabriel Tupy)
description:
A game about high scores and dodging enemies. Start the game and collect the green orb to increase your score! Watch out for the Red Enemies that come hurling at you and make sure to grab the green orb before it disappears or you get to far away from it. Gather as many green orbs as you can! The higher your score is the harder the game gets.

This Game was made in roughly 48hours and was a test to see if I could do it. Enjoy this simple game. Game Executable is located inside of the .Zip File.
